title: reply to Veronique
review_text:
I got a reply from Veronique Keytrade and I can't reply to that message but basically Keytrade offered 50 euros with the promocode "50inmypocket" last year which I did, but every time I tried completing my sign up, the app and website did not work. The QR code also didn't work.

I emailed Keytrade and it was some automated message with help to log in. 

I got fed up and emailed them again but didn't get anymore replies. I can't even close the account. I would show screenshots if I could.
summary: The customer had multiple issues with Veronique Keytrade's service, including failed sign-up attempts and technical problems with the app and website. They also experienced frustration not receiving further assistance despite repeated emails.

title: Great start with easy application and good communication
review_text: I am an ex-Belgian, now residing in Australia, who receives a modest pension from the Federal Pensions Service. ING's excessive fee structure has prompted me to look for another bank into which my pension can be deposited. After failing to find a bank that would allow me to open and activate an account remotely, I stumbled onto Keytrade. I was pleasantly surprised that they allowed me to fill out their comprehensive application form, followed by an acknowledgement and request for identification documentation, which I have provided. I am hopeful that my application will be approved. I found the website user-friendly, so we'll see what happens from here.
summary: The customer is satisfied with Keytrade's convenient online account activation process and positive user experience. They are hopeful for approval of their application and find the website to be easy to use.

title: info concise
review_text: info concise
summary: Concise information.

title: No complaints
review_text: No issues with online banking without having or using bankcards
summary: The customer found no issues with online banking without using bankcards.

title: Login simplification
review_text: Login simplification
summary: The reviewer found the "Login simplification" process efficient.

title: Very reactive support
review_text: Very reactive support
summary: The customer is satisfied with the reactive support they received.

title: Terrible support and extremely long waiting times
review_text: Terrible support. People sound like students on the phone, they don't listen to what you say, speak barely Dutch. Long waiting times before you get to speak to someone... very very very lousy service. This is not an occasional thing... it's really ALWAYS like that. And they always respond on trustpilot "We're working diligently to enhance our services and decrease the waiting times based on feedback like yours"... but it never gets resolved: look at all the terrible reviews! It's been going on for ages!
summary: The customer is extremely dissatisfied with their experience, describing poor communication, long wait times, and consistently bad service. They also criticize the company's response to feedback on platforms like Trustpilot.

title: Can't setup an account, TERRIBLE support
review_text:
I tried creating an account, but had no response for a full month, until I suddenly got an email asking me personal irrelevant information. 

I reply with the information and once again no response for 30 days.

I also haven't received any letter with the code for activating my account. I wasted 2 months trying to setup an account while I could just setup an account with a different bank within a day.

I do NOT recommend Keytrade bank, avoid at all cost.
summary: 2. **Summary:** The customer had issues with Keytrade bank's account setup process, including no response for a long period, personal irrelevant emails, and lack of communication regarding necessary account activation codes or confirmation. The customer expressed dissatisfaction with the time spent on troubleshooting and recommended not recommending Keytrade bank.

title: I recently contacted the Keytrade call‚Ä¶
review_text:
I recently contacted the Keytrade call center to inquire about opening a bank account, and my experience was nothing short of appalling. I spoke with an agent named Siam on Monday, November 25th, 2024, at around 10:30 am, and was shocked by her rude and unprofessional behavior.

From the start, Siam was dismissive and seemed unwilling to assist me. Her tone was abrupt, and her attitude made me feel like I was an inconvenience rather than a valued potential customer. To make matters worse, she hung up on me in the middle of our conversation. This level of disrespect is unacceptable and has left me questioning how someone with such poor customer service skills was hired for a customer-facing role.

I strongly urge the management to review the recording of this call and address this issue immediately. Such behavior tarnishes Keytrade‚Äôs reputation and could deter potential customers from ever considering your services. This experience has made me seriously reconsider whether I want to bank with Keytrade at all.
summary: The customer had a very poor experience with Keytrade‚Äôs call center agent, Siam. She was rude and unprofessional, leading to frustration and regret for the potential customer.

title: Good trading and email support ok
review_text:
Saw many others complaining about support and want to give good feedback to balance out a bit.

I‚Äôve been customer for around 14y now, got trading, current account, pension and since few months also visa.

Cost for current account is as advertised, no cost and gives back a cent per transaction. (Unlike ING that changed free online account into 2e/month).
The debit card works as other banks, also outside EU.

Trading is same day (dep on market open hour) while ING has a delay of 1d last time I tried.


Support:
I never called on phone, had few queries on different topic through the years and I did all via email with good response time and result. I‚Äôm happy in general.
summary: The customer is satisfied with the overall experience and finds good support.

title: Worst bank in belgium.dont let yourself‚Ä¶
review_text: Worst bank in belgium.dont let yourself be fooled by their free account. Zero customer service .they kick you out when they dont earn enough out of you. Claims they dont honour. Go for the well known banks and not this tiny amateuristic bank.
summary: The customer is extremely dissatisfied with the bank, calling it the "worst" and advising against choosing it due to poor service, lack of honor in transactions, and a reputation for not being reliable.

title: i tried to open an account for my child and all went wrong
review_text: i tried to open an account for my child, it took 6 weeks to get back with all information and they opened on my name, when i contacted them (40min wait in the phone) they told it was my fault because i didnt selected 'kid's plan' although when they requested the documents they ask me a copy of my id and a copy of my child's id. I have submitted several emails to ask for an update and i get no answers, phone calls wait is 40min at least and service desk does not know what went wrong, just terrible service!
summary: 2. **Summary**: The customer had a very poor experience due to long wait times and unclear issues, with no resolution despite multiple attempts.

title: Customer service on the lowest level
review_text: I was trying to pay for something a couple of hundreds euro with the credit card and each time I tried to confirm the QR code I was receiving error and it was impossible to finalize the payment. So I called the help desk. The gentlemen on the phone told me there's no request for payment on my account and that problem is with me not with the bank. So thank you for nothing Keytrade Bank - you just lost a client...
summary: The customer had issues with their credit card payment and was unsatisfied with Keytrade Bank's response, leading to the loss of a client.

title: support truly unacceptable, gif us our money!
review_text: After five years of not using our Keytrade Bank account, we discovered that friends had been depositing money into this account without our knowledge. Unfortunately, we had lost our keys and tokens, making it impossible to access the account. Since January (8 months), we have been trying to regain access, but the customer service has been utterly disappointing. They have failed repeatedly to assist us, leaving us frustrated and concerned. At this point, we are seriously questioning whether we will ever see our money again. The lack of support from Keytrade Bank is truly unacceptable.
summary: 2. **Summary:** The customer is extremely unhappy with Keytrade Bank's customer service, feeling betrayed and frustrated due to their inability to access the account after keys and tokens were lost. They question whether they will ever see their money again and find the support provided by Keytrade Bank unacceptable.

title: Still waiting on our stolen money
review_text:
Card gets blocked because of a scam. So far so good üëç.
We received an email that the amount will be transferred back in a couple of days. Medio augustus still waiting on or money... Several calls, different answers, still no refund...just give us back our stolen money and fulfill your promise!
summary: 2. **Summary:** The customer is dissatisfied as they received a blocked card due to a scam, spent money on an amount that never gets transferred, and had multiple unsuccessful attempts to receive a refund for the lost money.

title: Unresponsive & unhelpful in case of e.g death
review_text: When your account gets blocked (e.g. decease), Keytrade is unresponsive. Out 4 banks I have had to deal with Keytrade is by far the slowest, least responsive and most administrative. Furthermore, their Terms & Conditions give them a discretionary, unilateral right to block accounts and zero guidance, procedure or appeal options - unless a lawyer - to unblock. For info: Argenta was by and large the fastest and easiest to work with in my particular case.
summary: The customer had a very negative experience with Keytrade when their account was blocked. They mentioned being unresponsive, slow, and administrative, as well as the lack of support options like appeals or procedures. They also criticized Argenta for a perceived unfair right to block accounts.

title: Easy to use online banking
review_text: Easy to use online banking! Also nice referral bonus!
summary: 2. "Easy to use online banking! Also nice referral bonus!"

title: Who's in of such a poor customer service
review_text:
My experience is based on nearly 10 contacts over a long period--
1) it takes forever to get anybody to pick up the phone- several times after 10 minutes, you just give up and hang up- this happens all the time
2) today, called for a possible false Keytrade communication received.Ended up being screamed at because  after having identified  myself name,birthdate,birthplace, address  and giving 3 of my portefolio stocks I was asked for my last transaction done which I could not recall!
3) Keytrade app is very non- intuitive and difficult to use- even after years of use , not easy.Compared to Charles Schwab which I also have it's night vs day

NET NET--Awful customer approach and always slow , ineffective  and NOT pleasant.
summary: The customer's experience is frustrating due to slow response times, a poorly designed application, and negative interactions.

title: Not recommended
review_text: A Kafkaesque experience. Endless loops, nonintuitive, arrogant customer service. I'm out.
summary: The customer had a negative experience due to what they described as an "endless loops," nonintuitive, and arrogant customer service. They expressed their frustration by saying, "I'm out."

title: using Keytrade bank for more than 3‚Ä¶
review_text:
using Keytrade bank for more than 3 years now , with Visa Gold , all free of any kind of charge since i do more than 12 transactionS per year.
i called customer service to have a higher visa limit because of upcoming travel to the US and they did this within 2 days after providing some documents , very smooth and easy .
very satisfied with the service .
if you guys can add Instant payments and Itsme you will be the best bank in Belgium .
summary: 2. **Summary:** The customer is highly satisfied with Keytrade Bank due to its extensive services, including Visa Gold and free transactions for over a decade, smooth customer service response, and an offer of Instant payments that they believe would enhance their banking experience further.

title: And the worth online customer‚Ä¶
review_text:
And the worth online customer experience ever created online goes to...
Full of bugs, loops and other painful experiences. Just avoid these guys, they simply should disappear from the market.. sorry
summary: N/A

title: Helpdesk by email.
review_text: There was an issue regarding a stock split, but I got an answer by email within 12 hours. It looks like they have improved their customer service again after a bad period.
summary: The customer expressed satisfaction with the quick response to their issue and noted improvements in customer service.

title: Simple et efficace
review_text: Simple, efficace
summary: Simple and effective.

title: Good Company
review_text: Good Company, nice service!
summary: Good Company, nice service!

title: Bank that is not reachable.
review_text:
Bank that is not reachable.
Use of very dirty tactics like messing with the music on the waiting queue (distorted sound), and keep you ages on the line.
summary: The customer had a negative experience with the bank due to being unable to communicate and disruptive tactics used during the waiting queue.

title: An online bank with no online service
review_text: An online bank with no response to online requests. Took over 10 months to regain access to my account. E-mails remain unanswered and phone calls get the same generic response. Only after threatening to get federal banking authorities involved was there action. Stay away!
summary: The customer is highly dissatisfied with the online bank's response to their requests, taking over a year for account access recovery, and they feel ignored by both email and phone communications. They threaten legal action if their concerns are not addressed, advising others to avoid this bank.

title: Blocking of account ... no info
review_text: When these guys block your account without telling you what is the issue it becomes a big challenge. Called and on the phone they said "some" documents missing, could not answer which ones. Submitted by email and no action one week later. Bad customer service.
summary: 2. **Summary:** The customer had a bad experience with the service due to being blocked without clear information about the issue and receiving no action for several weeks, leading to dissatisfaction.

title: Account blocked
review_text: I really like this bank but blocking my account for over a week i called multiple times asking support if they can see the reason for the blocked account they are unable to see i emailed them multiple times received an email from them saying my complaint was forwarded to the right department and but im yet able to do anything .
summary: The customer expresses satisfaction with their banking experience at the bank despite facing a temporary issue.

title: No communication or transparency
review_text:
I relocated from Belgium and was forced to close my account despite providing all the requested documentation. This was done with no prior warning, and 7 months after i submitted all identification documents. impossible to speak to someone in charge of the file and Keytrade refused to provide any explanation/detail why. 
Awful service - stay well away from this bank, there are plenty of better options
summary: The customer had a very poor experience with Keytrade Bank. They were forced to close their account without warning and faced difficulties in contacting support. As a result, the reviewer strongly advises others not to use this bank.

title: Very poor banking
review_text: Very poor banking. I went to Keytrade because it has a free banking niche. oh how I regret this. a lot of detours to get everything installed. payconic still hasn't worked. the website crashes very often, meaning you cannot do what is necessary. Customer service is also extremely slow in answering emails. Very difficult as this would be the only "smooth" way of communicating. I have only been a customer for a few months, but I am so annoyed by this bank that I am immediately switching to another one.
summary: The customer is dissatisfied with Keytrade's banking service, describing multiple issues such as difficulties installing services, ongoing problems with PayConic, frequent website crashes, slow customer service response times, and expressing a strong intention to switch to another bank.

title: It took me 6 weeks to get access back‚Ä¶
review_text:
It took me 6 weeks to get access back to my account. Extremely slow client administration service. They have the wrong birth date in the system, I sent my passport again 6 week ago, still not changed. "They have a lot of work" (well, so get a lot of people to do it !).

Transactions costs are also quite high (20 times more than IB).
summary: The customer is dissatisfied with their slow account access and administrative service, as well as high transaction costs.

title: Keytradebank : stay away
review_text: I can only acknowledge the recent negative experiences of other users recently posted. I can't get access to my account (while this previously worked). The phone number simply keeps you on the hook for hours and the weblink suggested by a certain V√©ronique give absurd results (or loops)
summary: The customer expresses dissatisfaction with recent negative experiences and frustration over issues like account access and unhelpful phone numbers.

title: Service far below zero
review_text: I have now filed 4 identical complaints to Keytrade in 4 weeks. I am paying for a regular update of my portfolio; however for a fund in which I invested the present value is not updated since 5 weeks ago.
summary: The customer is expressing dissatisfaction with Keytrade due to delays in updating their portfolio and has filed multiple complaints. They are expecting a regular update but have been repeatedly denied.

title: Simple et direct
review_text: Simple et direct
summary: Simple and direct.

title: Application simple √† utiliser et c'est‚Ä¶
review_text: Application simple √† utiliser et c'est vrai que l'on re√ßoit 5cents par transaction
summary: The application is simple to use and provides a good discount of 5 cents per transaction.

title: Canal de communication direct
review_text: Canal de communication direct, fiable et efficace !
summary: The customer is satisfied with the Canal de Communication Direct.

title: ok - would recommend
review_text:
Ok. Nice checking account.

Trading view is limited. 
Autpilor investing is good, but with other cheaper brokers you have a better deal by investing also some time..
summary: The customer has a positive experience with the checking account and trading view, but finds that their autopilolo system for investing is better when dealing with cheaper brokers.

title: Services, site, informations
review_text: Services, site, informations
summary: The customer is evaluating services, site, and information.

title: parfait parfait
review_text: parfait parfait
summary: Perfect

title: efficiente website en app
review_text: efficiente website en app. Prima bank
summary: The customer seems satisfied with both the website and app of Prima Bank.

title: Super app - banking at no cost
review_text: Super app and there is really no other bank that offers its banking services at no cost and pays 5 cent per payment transaction!
summary: The customer is highly satisfied with the app and finds that their bank offers no-cost banking services and pays only a small transaction fee.

title: Really happy with Keytrade Bank
review_text: Really happy with Keytrade Bank. Very simple and easy use products and you get some money at each bank transactions. No recurrent fee for your bank account.
summary: 2. **Summary**: "Really happy with Keytrade Bank. Very simple and easy use products and you get some money at each bank transaction. No recurrent fee for your bank account."

title: card blocked,no rental car
review_text: card was suddenly blocked by supposedly 3 wrong attempts, but that was absolutely not my fault.  Payment made 14 days before with that code without a problem.  answer from helpdesk (after waiting 20,30,20 minutes on the phone): card is unblocked but can only become active again in Belgium.  there you are at the airport of faro in Portugal without being able to receive your reserved rental car.
summary: **Summary:** The customer had their card blocked by three incorrect attempts, which they attribute to something not their fault. Despite a payment made 14 days before the issue, the assistance received from the helpdesk was unsatisfactory; the card remains active only in Belgium but cannot be used at the airport of Faro in Portugal, where their rental car is reserved.

title: Good app and easy to use
review_text: So far I'm happy with the service I receive with Keytrade bank. The app is good and user-friendly!
summary: The customer is happy with the service received from Keytrade bank and finds the app good and user-friendly.

title: The only they do is steal away your money
review_text: This bank clearly shows how banks are the biggest scammers in the economy. First they steal away thousands of euros in conversion fees from moving money from your 'current' to 'trading account', they just don't respond on messages being sent, the only thing you get they would respond in 2-4 weeks time but they never do and today I noticed a negative balance of about 110 EUR on the trading account while that balance was 0 EUR. I am moving away my money immediately and I suggest everyone to stay away from these scammers. NOT RECOMMENDED AT ALL!
summary: The customer is highly dissatisfied with their banking experience at the bank, criticizing the bank's lack of responsiveness and negative balance issues. They advise others to stay away from this bank and recommend not using it.

title: In breach of art 8 of ECHR
review_text: Keytrade bank compliance, in addition to requesting source of funds in accordance with AML directives ( which I always provided) required that I sent them a copy of all my bank transactions over the past 18 months at another bank. When I refused on the basis that their request is unnecessary and a disproportionate intrusion into my private and family life ( article 8 of ECHR) Keytrade notified me that they are closing all my accounts and that no explanation is necessary. This is abusive and in breach of  art 8 of ECHR and causes me tremendous distress.
summary: The customer experienced an abusive action from Keytrade Bank, leading to the closure of all accounts without a proper explanation. They also expressed significant distress due to this breach of rights.

title: By far the worst app/bank on the market.
review_text:
By far the worst app on the market.

I'm stuck with Keytrade since I've my loan with them but i would advice anyone to not use their services. You cant call them, you spent 1 hour in the queue to have someone on the phone and you never get anybody. All the Bancontact system is trash, works half the time. Money is debited from account without arriving to the Marchand, it takes moth to get back the money. Worst bank and mobile app ever created. When you contact them by email with a question, they answer you as if you were the stupidest human alive.
summary: The customer is highly dissatisfied with Keytrade and Bancontact systems due to poor service, long queues, and delays in communication. They consider Keytrade the worst app and mobile bank ever created.

title: Account since 1998 and starting to wonder why I'm still
review_text: I'm account since 1998 at the time the bank was still one of the first online brokers in Belgium. Back than it was called Van Moer Santerre. The platform for trading was one of the few in the Benelux and worked like a charm. Taken over by Cr√©dit Mutuel Ark√©a everything went (or most of it) went South. Especially customer assistance is at lowest quality level since they started out in the 90s. I'm still here for the trading platform while even pretty exotic derivatives can be trade (and this without to have to beg to create the equity). Probably the reason why trading is expensive. Meanwhile the platform is outdated at least for one reason; modifying a pending order is NOT possible. One needs to cancel it first and enter it renewed with the needed modified conditions.
summary: The customer is unhappy with the bank's recent changes and issues regarding customer support. They find the trading platform outdated, particularly concerning the inability to modify pending orders.

title: no more access to my accounts
review_text: no more access to my accounts - no response to mails, waited more than 30min to get someone on the phone - no one picked up
summary: The customer is dissatisfied due to the lack of access to their accounts, no response to emails or phone calls, and a long wait time.

title: Problem with VISA card and funds
review_text: I'm customer to Keytrade for around 3 years and it was fine until this year (2023) when I got money taken out of my VISA card without authorisation. I followed their procedure to get the money back but I never had it back. Customer service can't help and they don't give the money back and you can't contact VISA yourself. I've had to go to mediator. Trading stocks is costly. A lot of small IT problems. Benefits when doing transactions are great though.
summary: 2. **Summary:** The customer had a bad experience with Keytrade, facing unauthorized ATM withdrawals and dissatisfied with customer service, leading to the need for mediation. They also mentioned small IT issues affecting their trading costs but noted benefits in transactions.

title: Plenty of errors, problems & no customer support
review_text:
The website and app often give errors not allowing you to buy or sell stock.
Customer service does not exist.
After selling a stock or cancelling an order it takes ages before you can use the money which should have become available again.
Trying to transfer money from Keytrade to your own account is a mess and the site often gives an error that insufficient funds are available while there are plenty of funds.
summary: The customer is highly dissatisfied with the website and app due to frequent errors preventing them from buying or selling stock, long waiting times for refunds after transactions, and issues transferring money that should have been available.

title: Worst bank ever
review_text:
Worst bank ever. Customer support is terrible ‚Äì not providing any solution. And even giving wrong information. 

I had to call them many times because my cards (credit and debit) were surprisingly blocked after a trip to Canada. It took me 5 calls to unlock them. And then suddenly, the same day, both of them were locked AGAIN. Customer service was then explaining to me how to remember my PIN code !!!!!

As a result, I move abroad without any payment method. But don't worry, they'll send the replacement card in 10days, in BELGIUM !!!!!
summary: 2. **Summary:** The customer had a very negative experience with the bank, including poor customer support and frustrating issues with card access and account protection. As a result, they have decided to move abroad without using their payment methods, but the bank is offering to send a replacement within 10 days.

title: Poor customer service
review_text:
Poor customer service at its best..
Went trough all the identification questions correctly.
Last questions was "when did you log in the last time?" Living abroad and not using the mobile app much, I couldn't reply the exact DATE... 
I didn't pass the identification and have to go through a bunch of additional requests by email
summary: The customer had a poor experience due to incorrect identification and additional email requests.

title: Worst online bank in history
review_text: Worst online bank in history, nothing works, contacting them is useless, certain operations are done without any confirmation or anything, etc. For example to close your Keyplan (funds plan) you can't do it online, you need to send an email and then... no idea when it's closed, at what prices, and the whole history disappears from the website so you can't properly fill in your compliance report. My latest problem: I need to do an urgent wire transfer and the site says it's done but then... the money is still there and no transfer is showing. Second time I try and same result. Then now after doing such an operation, the website tends to freeze and there's nothing you can do but log back in. When I changed my Keyplan, the new composition still included an old fund, nobody noticed, I told them and they had no solution, nothing, it's total emptiness, probably only clueless people still work there. Remove your money quickly, if you even manage, and I would say close your account but that probably requires letters and faxes and takes weeks without knowing what's going on. I hope the authorities raid them and expose this fraud of a bank.
summary: 2. The customer is extremely dissatisfied with the online bank due to issues like account closure problems, lack of confirmation for operations, and unexpected discrepancies in transactions.

title: Don't bother opening an account
review_text:
I followed the procedure to open an account online in November 2022. We're March 2023 and I'm still waiting... I did get a mail from them in January to which I replied immediately. I sent them a mail last week to get a status.. Still waiting for a non-automated reply..
It's quite possible that they are overwhelmed and understaffed but this is getting ridiculous.
summary: The customer is frustrated due to extended wait times and unresponsive service.

title: Do not support ITSME and their own logon takes weeks
review_text:
Why on earth do you not support logon via ITSME like every other bank and insurance company in Belgium??

I would trade so much more (generating revenue for you) if it was easier and safer to log on.
 
I do not want to have to use your specific hardkey or app to confirm my login - I do not trust it, and it is a pain to activate because it takes you weeks to answer password reset requests.
summary: The customer is dissatisfied with the bank's logon process and the lack of a secure authentication method. They express frustration with using ITSME and prefer easier, safer login options but also criticize the lengthy password resets.

title: Support & continuity of apps
review_text:
App renew: contact helpdesk will take you like 4 weeks. before you have all instructions and data to re-install.
They kindly give you a hardkey later on, but impossible to install following there instructions....
So bad app and support.
summary: The customer is highly dissatisfied with the app's functionality and support. They experienced delays and were unable to follow instructions for re-installation, leading to a poor experience overall.

title: Where is the one-star for this joke of‚Ä¶
review_text:
Where is the one-star for this joke of a bank ? It hurts me to put one-star to this. I had one simple thing to do : change my adress, correct a problem with my connection or else an old pennystock was going to cost me. 
It's been more than a month that we are trying to solve this. By email they tell you any enquiry will take 4 weeks to answer (I have the mail). They send you automatic mail to press you to connect or pay more. And nothing. You can't have them on the phone, you write them letter it takes 3 weeks to come back, they barely answer emails. Then you receive something and the process is so precise that anything you do put you back to square one, you have no margin for behavioral error and you can't see them, you can't talk to someone. 
No idea how much this will cost me but this is a joke, this is not a bank, this is an orgnization of insane IT people designing process that only works for them. 
I'm almost laughing, I was asking for such a simple thing and it's not close from being over. You will never gonna get them on the phone and they ask you to call them asap. 
Just terrible, just terrible.
summary: The customer had a frustrating banking experience due to slow response times, unclear instructions, and frustration with communication and service quality.

title: This bank uses old-fashioned software‚Ä¶
review_text: This bank uses old-fashioned software and doesn't respond quickly to emails. Very sloppy way of doing business.
summary: The customer is dissatisfied with the bank's outdated software and lack of responsiveness to emails. They describe the business process as sloppy.

title: Impossible service
review_text: Impossible service. Probably call center where there is a big difference in quality of the service you get ...from very willing to help to flat out terrible. Always other people on the phone, who say they will send your request to "the appropriate administrative service desk" , that after 6  weeks of waiting and 4 calls simply don't send the necessary information. They can't even tell you to what address they eventually will send your information. If you are in need of professional and speedy help, please please please go somewhere else, because keytrades service is one big frustration...
summary: 2. **Summary:** The customer is highly dissatisfied with the service, describing it as "impossible" and "terrible." They express frustration with the inability to receive timely responses and clear instructions from the company's support team.

title: Very bad it is not possible
review_text: I confirm, very bad service.  An internet bank that sends you PDFs, no follow-up the person who answers your email is different each time and does not provide any follow-up to your requests.  After more than 2 years of explaining to ask for a better credit card and stipulating that the account is only in my name, it blocks everything, despite the fact that my wife is not a co-holder and has never received  a soft or hard key .... but each speaker asks again to explain everything.  each but is read by a person so it is the snake that kills its tail.  the only positive point with this bank is that we are happy to leave it and even then... you have to follow up to get confirmation.
summary: The customer is expressing dissatisfaction with poor service and frustrating experiences related to account management.

title: Autonomy and customer services
review_text: Customer services respond fast by mail or by phone and they give you the best answer. It's free and you get a little something for each transaction. You have app for phone, tablet and a website. as a young person who work for 10 years and who is at ease with technology is perfect because you have a great deal of autonomy.
summary: The customer has a positive experience with fast and helpful service, including free options and a user-friendly interface. They also appreciate the autonomy provided to young professionals.

title: Requested the keypack including a‚Ä¶
review_text:
Requested the keypack including a credit card a few weeks ago. Have followed up 3 times over email but have not heard anything back. Tried to call them and was on the line for 15 minutes after which I gave up.

 If it is this difficult to contact them when trying to open an account, I don‚Äôt want to know how difficult it would be to get in contact with them when you have issues as a client.
summary: The customer had difficulty getting in touch with the company and felt frustrated by the lack of response.

title: Simply racist and hypocritical
review_text: Do you want to be racially discriminated as a customer? Keytrade Bank is your choice! Do you want to be lied to your face and ignored in service-related questions? Think no more, Keytrade Bank is your choice! Awful and disgusting, I want to take a shower after every time communicating with them. In my case, Keytrade Bank support openly told me I was born in the wrong place to have an account in their bank.
summary: The customer is highly dissatisfied with Keytrade Bank due to repeated negative experiences, including racial discrimination and poor service. They express a strong desire for change and are so unhappy that they prefer not to engage further.

title: KEYTRADE BANK is a bad joke
review_text:
My first negative review. 

As a medical doctor, student and soldier that collaborated with several international banking institutions within 4 EU states; I urge you to avoid at all costs  ¬´¬†KEYTRADE BANK¬†¬ª !

A polite uncoordinated staff with BS feedbacks, giving fake expectations defines my brief experience with their customer service. 
The supposedly straight to the point online application became a bad joke !

And on the contrary I got to appreciate their selection of MOH.
 
Conclusion: 
Here is the Middle Office final response  after 34 days of ¬´¬†processing¬†¬ª my application.

¬´¬†Dear Sir,

After a complete analysis of your request, we regret to inform you that we are unable to open this account. Your application did not meet the necessary requirements.
As stated in our General Terms and Conditions*, we are not obliged to justify our decision.

Yours sincerely,

Middle Office¬†¬ª - KEYTRADE BANK (03/05/2022).
summary: The customer wrote a negative review due to dissatisfaction with the service, particularly the staff behavior and application experience. They mention BS feedback and fake expectations from the company. However, they also note appreciation for the selection of MOH.

Having written emails over and over again asking for an update, phoned multiple times with getting cut off, I think it is time to move on. It's a pity as I have been with them since 2015.

title: Very slow and bad customer service
review_text: If you're looking to open a joint banking account, keytrade bank is not the place for you. My partner and I were hoping to open a joint account to manage our expenses while on vacation. Two months and a vacation later, our bank account still hasn't been opened. We have tried reaching out to Keytrade Bank several times but have received little to no information about the progress of our request.

title: Keytrade Bank offers potential but is let down by bureaucracy, poor support, and barriers to entry
review_text:
The web site and banking application are easy to look at and work.  

Their Softkey ( fancy name for QR code authentication scanning ), mostly doesn't work except for making bank transfers.

Their investing and trading app looks excellent. Except it is impossible to place a trade. Why? Because placing any order requires the completion of KeyTrade's in house vetting programme, which consists of an examination on trading and investing. I've been trading with other brokers for more than ten years, and have made money. Yet I was unable to satisfy  Keytrade, and as such they would not ever let me buy one share in an ETF, or common stock! After trying on and off for more than three years, I have given up and shall carry on with one of their competitors. 

I was going to have my mortgage with them,but the web site and mobile don't work with much else, so I did not take the risk with a mortgage. There is no one to speak with: I cannot just pick up the telephone can call them.

Bureaucraticy: The banking procedures are cumbersome and insanely bureaucratic, and bar is set high for insane bureaucracy in Belgium.

Telephone Support: they have a phone number, but never answer it.  Waste of line rental, if you ask me.

Email support: Always a 24 hours delay.  

WhatsApp/SocialMedia: I will not use WhatsApp or Facebook so I shan't contact them through those mediums. 

There are much easier Belgian banks to deal with, and there are much easier investment fintech startups to deal with than KeyTrade.

I cannot recommend KeyTrade.
summary: The customer is highly dissatisfied with KeyTrade, citing issues with its banking and investing app functionality, difficulty in completing trades, cumbersome bureaucratic procedures, unresponsive phone support, delayed email responses, lack of social media or WhatsApp contact options, and compared to easier alternatives. They advise against recommending KeyTrade.

title: Keytrade Bank Luxembourg
review_text:
I have mixed feelings about Keytrade Bank Luxembourg, and it's mainly about customer service. I have opened an account with them in June (2021) or somewhere in that time of year. I'm doing this as a non-EU resident and a lot was asked from me to be sent to them physically (which is fine by me as I respect their KYC procedures). I asked them if they could first check the scanned versions of those documents before I send anything by post. They said OK - appreciated! My account was opened like a week after them receiving everything - not lightning fast but acceptable. Then, there was a problem for them to send me my bank details (access code + other stuff) by post. After waiting for almost a month, if not more, I assumed that my bank details were lost (which is also understandable because international postal services could be wacky sometimes). I then called them. The representative offered to send another copy by FedEx, I said OK thank you. The second delivery arrived without any problem. At that point, I had a very good impression about the bank: responsible, helpful customer services, etc., but then, the glitch started. In early August, I found an unrecognized charge to my current account of 137 euros plus some change. I contacted customer service and they said that was the delivery cost. Wait!? Neither was the existence nor the (actual or estimated) amount was mentioned during my call to the customer service. Neither was I offered a choice to use regular mail again nor was this explicitly mentioned in their price list. (OK there is a footnote in their pricing list on postal charges for sending Hardkey outside the EEA but that was only for the Hardkeys as how I perceived it. And such a charge could be avoided by not asking for a Hardkey and stick to the Softkey.)

I then contacted customer support and ask for a refund of such a hidden charge, as this is clearly, and by definition, a hidden charge. As how I see it, my email was pretty polite and as soft as possible - I do not want to offend anyone. However, the reply was a joke - pretty much like a kid defending him/herself knowing (and admitting) that he/she did something wrong. They admitted that they should inform me but refuse to refund anything. In addition, three hilarious points were raised by the representative:
1. I should have expected them to send my bank details to me by FedEx at the time of account opening 
	Exactly, how???
2. Their main target market is the European market but not the Asian market
	So I'm not welcomed???
3. At the time I stored my money in my savings account and "this is not the purpose of the service our bank offers" 
	So you are trying to push me into something??? In fact I was trying to subscribe to their "KeyPrivte" portfolio at the time and certainly when you log in and see an unrecognized charge, you hold on first. Then, the second move you take is to transfer the money from the current account to the savings account to protect any further charge in this line. (I literally thought my account was somehow compromised at that time.)

If a bank could hidden-charge you for one thing, it could hidden-charge you for everything. I hate this hidden charge thing, especially when it comes to a bank. Price/commission being high/low, not a problem as long as everything is made clear so clients could make informed decisions. For a single wrongdoing, a bank could lose the clients' trust very easily. Banking is all about trust.

Here comes a small positive experience from a different issue. I was trying to transfer my money from my account to an external account of mine. I found that I couldn't do so as their online banking system refused to continue saying they do not hold sufficient info about me. I was pretty scared at that time and I called customer service. They promised to check it with their compliance team and contact me. After like half an hour, they emailed me saying that my account was unlocked - on this particular point, the customer service was efficient and helpful. (You could also argue that this is something of their job anyway, true.)

My feeling is that the bank is largely legit, but some of the customer service representatives could be very unprofessional and rude. And they (the management team) do not necessarily care about the customer experiences that much.

All in all, I would advise people to think twice before engaging with Keytrade Luxembourg, as there might be little glitches here and there.
summary: The customer had mixed feelings about Keytrade Bank Luxembourg and experienced significant issues with their account management and service, leading to distrust.

title: Huge fees, bad interface, hard to sell your positions due to malfunctions
review_text:
Keytrade.be claims to have 0 fees, but it's not true. For instance in their page the state that buying American stocks is only $29.95 dollars. But at the moment of doing the transaction, if you purchase $10.000 dollars of stock, they will charge you 1.21%, that's 121 dollars for buying and the 121 dollars for selling (or more if your make a profit).  And they don't even mention that in their fees page. In their page it says that it is only $29.95.

Second, and very important, I was trying to sell my stock and and they have a system where for each transaction you have to scan a QR code. Guess what? It didn't work at the moment of placing the order. I tried 4 times, the system kept saying there is a malfunction. Can you imagine, at the moment of selling?

Likewise, if you have placed an order, you cannot modify it. You have to cancel it and do it all again, plus the freaking QR scan. Super time consuming if you need to do a quick transaction or changed your mind.

Third the number of shares you own are not easily found, so you either guess them, or if you are lucky you may find them somewhere whenever you need to sell them.

The system logs you out abruptly saying that due to inactivity you were logged out, right after 5 minutes of using it, no being idle.

And there's more.
summary: The customer is unhappy with Keytrade.be's fee structure and issues with their transaction process, leading to frustration and difficulties in managing their stock transactions.

title: KeyTrade Luxembourg
review_text: As a customer of KeyTrade Luxembourg, I can't help but recommend to avoid this online broker as much as you can. Onboarding process is very lengthy, and it's not a matter of security/due diligence: other online brokers do this in a more streamlined way. They have an horrible website, often under maintenance (with no communication or alert ahead), offering no valuable insights. Stocks quotations are 15 minutes delayed, when even free services nowadays give you near-to-realtime statuses. They take scandalously high fees for stocks transactions (online trading), and ridiculous spreads on currency exchanges. Orders are not reliable at all: had twice my buy orders "at market" refused by the server with no additional explanation. Like you're sure to have closed a great deal but then you connect at market opening and you discover that the order has been discarded, and the stock price is now too high to buy. I won't make any names, but a lot of free online brokers are offering nowadays stocks trading in every market almost free of charge, more powerful, easier and reliable apps, so you can safely skip this bank/broker.
summary: The customer is highly dissatisfied with KeyTrade Luxembourg due to lengthy onboarding, security concerns, poor website usability, delayed stock quotes, high fees, and unreliable order execution. They also mention the prevalence of free online brokers offering better services in this area.

The little award they offer for attracting your money is peanut comparing to the money they rip off you!

If you're flexible, if you want to avoid going to the bank (they have no offices), if you want to do everything by email and (specially) you want to have very competitive costs ( they don't charge you, actually they pay you for each transaction :) ) this is a bank for you.

title: Dans l'ensemble, tr√®s bonne banque secondaire
review_text: Dans l'ensemble, tr√®s bonne banque secondaire (pour mon profil en tout cas). title: Carte Visa refus√©e sans explications sans jamais avoir √©t√© fich√© n√©gativement
review_text: Fra√Æchement retrait√©, je souhaitais faire de Keytrade Bank ma premi√®re banque, et quitter ma banque historique ING dont je suis client depuis 45 ans, afin de b√©n√©ficier des services de KB √† l'avenir, chez ING je poss√®de un compte √† vue, une "r√©serve permanente" (dont je n'ai plus le besoin) et une carte de cr√©dit MC. Avant de faire ma mutation interbancaire, je souhaitais faire la demande d'une carte Visa Gold afin de ne pas me trouver sans carte de cr√©dit avant de partir aux USA en juillet en quittant ma banque historique...je r√™vais √©veill√© apparemment, ma demande a √©t√© refus√©e sans aucune explication comme beaucoup d'avis laiss√©s ici. Cela m'apprendra √† croire que des banques "alternatives" puissent fonctionner comme les autres, seule possibilit√© qui s'offrait √† moi: enterrer mon souhait de devenir client, r√©silier mes comptes et rester chez ma banque historique !

title: Contact impossible-Service inexistant- d√©plorable
review_text:
Contact impossible avec une personne en particulier, ou m√™me un service interne. Etant client titres, certaines op√©rations demandent un suivi particulier.

Tout ceci est INDIGNE d'une banque Belge.
On vous dit de vous m√©fier des mails frauduleux, mais ceux envoy√©s par Keytrade, et en particulier par le service "Corporate Actions" sont honteux, plein de fautes et d'incoh√©rences. Le contact t√©l√©phonique est aussi ouvert qu'avec une prison..., et toute adresse mail personnelle est proscrite. De quoi vous d√©go√ªter
de cette banque (o√π je suis client, mais d√©pit√©..) 
Je compte finalement demander l'avis de ces mails "pourris"  √† l'ombudsman des banques. 
Merci de votre lecture et √† r√©fl√©chir 2 fois avant d'en √™tre captif comme client..... A.V

title: Zeer slechte service.
review_text:
Zeer slechte service.
De wachtijden aan de telefoon zijn al weken erg lang. Dat terzijde :
helpdesk 1 zgt : u zult een nieuwe smartphone moeten kopen, want het zal niet werken op uw motorola.
helpdesk 2 : heel lang geduld : app werkt.

Rekening op beider namen. 
Beide verantwoordelijk.
Blijkt dat slechts 1 partner een visa kan krijgen, want die heeft loonbrieven.
Geen loonbrief, geen visa.
Ookal staat er genoeg (evenveel als van de ander! ) op de rekening.

Bijzondere discriminatie van de vrouw aan de haard.
Alhoewel zij de  huizen koopt en verkoopt, de studiefinancieringen regelt, goed spaart : de partner wil NIETS met financien te maken hebben.

Tot zover het Keytrade expiriment : mislukt !

(en ja een kaart op eigen naam is nodig voor als je bijv. een vliegticket koopt  !)
summary: The customer is dissatisfied with service, specifically mentioning issues with a new smartphone and unhelpful helpdesk responses. There's also concern about discrimination in hiring practices, despite the company aiming for the NetEase system. The review concludes with frustration over the KeyTrade experiment and a negative self-assessment (implied by using an ellipsis).

title: ONVOORSTELBAAR disciminerend
review_text:
Wij waren na al het lezen van de reklame over Kenytrade heel enthousiast.
Nu blijkt, dat je als thuiswerkende partner , niet eens een visa kan krijgen , ookal heb je saldo genoeg, omdat je zelf geen loonbrieven hebt.
Ik voel me zeer zeer zwaar gediscrimineerd, omdat ik al zolang wij samen zijn, (van 1995) ALLES regel met financien, tot huizen verkopen en kopen toe !
Keytrade bank ?
Discrimineert vrouwen aan de haard !!!

title: Verschrikkelijk
review_text:
Verschrikkelijk! Het enige positieve is dat je 5 cent krijgt bij je verrichtingen. 
Voor de rest: onbekwame mensen. Willen/kunnen nooit helpen. Wij hebben al maanden problemen met onze debetkaart, ineens is de pincode niet meer juist (zowel oude als aangepaste). Pincode meermaals opgevraagd en wanneer we die ingeven, krijgen we nog steeds melding ‚Äòonjuiste pincode‚Äô. Het ligt ook aan ons en we krijgen geen nieuwe kaart. Kunnen nooit correct op een vraag antwoorden en zijn liever lui dan moe. Opeens wordt er ook geen bevestiging meer gevraagd bij online betalingen, dus iedereen kan zomaar mijn kaartgegevens gebruiken. Hun enige oplossing is ‚Äòpas uw instellingen aan‚Äô. Je moet dan zelf zoeken hoe en waar, maar zelfs dan blijft het probleem zich voordoen. Als je geld overstort is het dagenlang wachten eer het op die rekening staat. Mensen die twijfelen om Keytrade als bank te nemen, doe het niet! Meer miserie dan wat anders!
summary: **Summary:** The customer is dissatisfied with their service due to issues with delivery and incorrect address information. They criticize Keytrade for not correctly accepting the payment method. The review ends with a call to action for the company to reconsider their pricing structure.

title: Ervaring als nieuwe klant
review_text:
Na jaren zelf (tevreden) klant adviseer ik mijn (meerderjarige) dochter klant te worden. Ik geef haar aan hoe ze dat moet doen.

Na aanmaak rekening werkt de beursrekening niet.
Dan maar bellen met customer service. 
Reden: 1 werkdag tijd nodig voordat beursrekening werkt. geen showstopper, maar waarom wordt dat niet gewoon even aan nieuwe klant melden dan (zodat die niet 10' in wacht moet staan bij bellen)?

Nu dat opgelost wil ze vandaag ordertje plaatsen via app.  Dat blijkt niet te gaan want krijgen foutmelding.
Dan maar terug bellen met customer service.
Ze moet eerst kennis-test doen. Vandaar de foutmelding. Logisch die test, maar waarom niet even aan klant duidelijk maken via een bericht of popup?  Moeten dat weer zelf achterhalen? 

Dochter doet kennistest en die moet ze digitaal ondertekenen. Weer foutmelding.  Dus weer opnieuw customer service bellen.  Ik luister mee en probeer haar te helpen met de applicatie/ondertekening.  Blijken de app te moeten sluiten op telefoon (waarmee we bellen) want anders kunnen we digitaal niet tekenen. Mijn dochter begrijpt niet meteen wat de beste man bedoelt met zijn cryptische uitleg. Als ik aangeef dat het technisch niet zo duidelijk voor ons is, dan meldt de beste man dat hij het telefoontje meteen zal eindigen als ik mijn mond niet houd.. Ik begrijp waarom dit vanuit bescherming/veiligheid zo werkt. Maar mijn dochter kan niet verder met zijn complexe technische uitleg. En haar stap per stap even rustig begeleiden zit er precies vanavond niet bij hem in. Ik mag hem geen vragen stellen en houd dus mijn mond. Het wordt dus stil.. We houden het voor bekeken en eindigen de call. Na 3x customer service op 2 dagen geeft een nieuwe klant het op. Jammer.  We proberen het op een fris moment dan nog maar eens opnieuw te bekijken met haar. Wat een drama qua (new) client experience.
summary: The customer is satisfied with the services and appreciates the responsiveness of the customer service.

title: Spook spaarrekening
review_text:
Wij waren klant bij Moneyou en zijn dus beiden omgezet naar rekeningen van Keytrade bank.
Een rekening van mijn vrouw toen is omgezet naar een Keytrade High Fidelity spaarrekening,

Een tweede rekening op mijn naam is toen is omgezet naar een Moneyou High Fidelity spaarrekening. Door de lage opbrengst van de laatste jaren was ons niet opgevallen dat de opbrengst merkelijk lager is.
Wij zijn hiervan nooit in kennis gebracht en er was wel onduidelijkheid over deze omzetting.
Over deze rekening is nergens info te vinden, ik heb dus een spook rekening.
Met mijn Moneyou High Fidelity spaarrekening heb ik dus al enkele jaren opbrengst mis gelopen 
en voel mij hier als klant  niet goed bij. Er kan misschien eens nagedacht worden over een compensatie voor de misgelopen opbrengst.
Gelieve dus mijn Moneyou High Fidelity spaarrekening dringend om te zetten naar een Keytrade High Fidelity spaarrekening. Zelf kan ik dit niet via uw app.
Graag een verklaring waarom dit zo is gelopen,
summary: The customer had issues with both Moneyou and Keytrade banks, complaining about delayed transactions from Moneyou High Fidelity Spaarrekening and missing out on certain benefits from Keytrade High Fidelity Spaarrekening. They suggest switching to Keytrade High Fidelity.

Ik had graag gezien dat Keytrade een prijsbreker wordt op vlak van beleggingen en makelaarslonen.
